extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is affected by the vulnerability by retrieving the installed RM Shell version and Windows LTSC version.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by the vulnerability?
Which Windows LTSC version is installed?

extracted_playbook.title: Install Security Patch for Windows 10 LTSB 2016
extracted_playbook.description: Install the RM Image 5 Windows Cumulative Security Patch 03/2022 (KB5011495) including the 2021-09 Servicing Stack Update (KB5005698) and Microsoft .NET Framework 4.7.2 for x64 (KB4054590).

extracted_playbook.title: Install Security Patch for Windows 10 LTSC 2019
extracted_playbook.description: Install the RM Image 5.5 Windows Cumulative Security Patch for LTSC 03/2022 (KB5011503) including the 08/2021 Servicing Stack Update (KB5005112).

extracted_playbook.title: Connect Only to Trusted RDP Servers
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure that connections are made only to trusted RDP servers to prevent unauthorized access.

extracted_playbook.title: Protect RDP Servers with Security Measures
extracted_playbook.description: Protect your RDP servers with anti-virus software and an Intrusion Detection System (IDS).

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Access Control for RDP Servers
extracted_playbook.description: Implement access control to RDP servers and manage the roles of administrator and engineer on the affected device.
